txt.en: 'The Wave-hunter already has a complement of sailors, and they will best know how to bring us to Umbar, but you will want to fill out the crew with trusted and accomplished folk. After all, there will still be a rescue to manage once we arrive at the City of the Corsairs! King Elessar suggested several additions to the crew, and if you deem these enough we can sail as soon as you have returned with them: Lady Nauriel of Pinnath Gelin, the boon companions Legolas and Gimli, Lord Sirgon of Pelargir, Corudan's sister Sigileth, and the Corsair Jajax. I have compiled notes on each of these, and on others who might be willing to sail with us on the Wave-hunter. Consult my notes in the book on the table there, and may it prove useful as you assemble your crew.'
Caebar has written some notes about potential crew-members for the Wave-hunter. Consult the book on the table in the library of Lond Cirion, and let it guide you as you assemble your crew.
